DOC.brief_summary: This study examine next-day residual effect nighttime dose gabapentin 250 mg , diphenhydramine citrate 76 mg triazolam 0.5 mg compare placebo simulate driving performance normal volunteer subject . It also examine measure next-day performance next-day sleepiness .
DOC.brief_title: Next-Day Residual Effects Gabapentin , Diphenhydramine Triazolam Simulated Driving Performance Normal Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female nonchildbearing potential , 2555 year age Valid driver 's license Psychiatric disorder Recent history clinically significant neurological disorder , seizure , stroke , multiple sclerosis , head trauma Recent histroy current treatment sleep disorder
